column5: Private bedroom with desk and TV on 2nd floor of Houston Heights town home. Private bathroom with shower. Very clean house kept at cool temperature to beat Houston's hot summer.   Great location in the heights. Walking distance to hike & bike trail, parks and restaurants. 5 Minute walk to White Oak Dr., 12 minute drive to downtown (5.6 miles), 14 minute drive to the Galleria (7.4 miles).
column8: Private room in heart of Houston Heights.
